Name: Ponchoman
About the game: Ponchoman is roguelike top down shooter game. The character you're going to control, ponchoman, has to kill the constantly spawned creatures in graveyard. If you kill more creatures, the more powerful you can upgrade your initial weapon. But if you die, everything including weapon will be reset. Until you die kill as many creations as you can and set a new record. Praying doesn't help at all.
